markdownRemark.html:
When setting up a new Mac there are a number of tools that I install.

Developer tools

  • Xcode - xcode-select --install
  • Homebrew - a useful package manager to install tools
  • VSCode - my favourite text editor for writing code
  • Docker - for spinning up db containers etc.

Utility tools

  • Scroll Reverser - a tool to reverse the scroll direction on mouse / trackpad, helpful to use a “natural” feeling scroll direction when switching between the two
